type.name: affected_item_select
type.description: A extensible select used to detail the items that are the within the scope of the work request.

type.name: work_request_approval_item
type.description: This select extends an approval_assignment to apply to Work_request instances.

type.name: work_request_date_or_date_time_item
type.description: This select is a extends the assignments of a date or a date and time to Work_request instances.

type.name: work_request_documented_element_select
type.description: This select extends the assignments of a document_assignment to Work_request instances.

type.name: work_request_organization_or_person_in_organization_item
type.description: This select extends the assignments of an organization or a person in an organization to Work_request instances.

entity.name: Activity_method_assignment
entity.description: An Activity_method_assignment is an object that associates an Activity_method with a Work_request. The associated Activity_method serves as a potential method to resolve the tasks requested in the Work_request.

explicit.name: assigned_method
explicit.description: The assigned_method identifies the Activity_method that is a potential solution to the issues idenitfied by the Work_request.

explicit.name: associated_request
explicit.description: The associated_request identifies the Work_request that the potential method applies to.

explicit.name: relation_type
explicit.description:
Identifies the nature of the relationship between an Activity_method and the Work_request.
The relationship may indicate that the Activity_method is the recommend approach to accomplishing the work requested.
The relationship may indicate that the Activity_method is not a recommended approach to accomplishing the work requested.

entity.name: Affected_items_assignment
entity.description: A relationship between a Work_request and the items that are the focus of the work request.

explicit.name: assigned_work_request
explicit.description: The work_request for which a set of items are being identified.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: The items that are affected by the Work_request.

entity.name: Work_request
entity.description: A Work_request is a request that identifies the need for work to be carried out on a product or on product information. These requests may or may not ever actually be incorporated, depending upon the level of authorization granted to the request and its associated work order.

explicit.name: purpose
explicit.description: an informal description of the reason for the Work_request.

explicit.name: request_id
explicit.description: the identification of the work_request assigned by the requestor organization.

explicit.name: version_id
explicit.description: specifies the identification of the version of the Work_request.

entity.name: Work_request_relationship
entity.description:
A relationship between two work_requests.
Two work_requests may be related if they are addressing similiar problems.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: the text that characterizes the work_request_relationship.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the identifier that distinguishes the work_request_relationship.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: the label by which the work_request_relationship is known.

explicit.name: related_work_request
explicit.description: The other instance of work_request that is a part of the relationship. If one work_reques in the relationship is dependent upon the other, this attribute shall be the dependent one.

explicit.name: relating_work_request
explicit.description: One of the instances of work_request that is being related.

entity.name: Work_request_status
entity.description: A user interpretable designation for the level of completion of the Work_request.

explicit.name: status
explicit.description: That status assigned to the work_request.

explicit.name: work_request
explicit.description: The work_request to which the status is assigned.
